name: Fetch Alerts from SIEM
description: Fetches alerts by querying to SIEM

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND event_type:sysmon AND (event_id:"12" OR event_id:"13") AND (event_data.TargetObject.keyword:HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit_DLLs OR event_data.TargetObject.keyword:HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit_DLLs)

steps.name: Query for use of attrib to hide files

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND (image_path:"C:\\Windows\\System32\\attrib.exe" OR image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\attrib.exe") AND event_data.CommandLine:"*+h*"

steps.name: Query for Netsh helper DLL registry key modification

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND (event_id:"12" OR event_id:"13") AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND event_data.TargetObject:"HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\NetSh\\*"

steps.name: Query for processes spawned by Netsh

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND (parent_image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\netsh.exe" OR parent_image_path:"C:\\Windows\\System32\\netsh.exe")

steps.name: Query for modification of scrnsave_exe registry key using powershell

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND event_data.CommandLine:*New-ItemProperty*-Path*\"HKCU\:\\Control\ Panel\\Desktop\"\ -Name\ \"SCRNSAVE.EXE\"*

steps.name: Query for modification of scrnsave_exe registry key using reg_exe

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.elasticHuntStart}} TO {{vars.elasticHuntEnd}} } AND (image_path:C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\reg.exe OR image_path:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\reg.exe) AND (image_path:C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\reg.exe OR image_path:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\reg.exe) AND event_data.CommandLine:reg*add\ \"HK*\\Control\ Panel*\\Desktop\"\ \/v*"SCRNSAVE.EXE"*

steps.name: Query for scr file executed outside of system32 or syswow64

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.elasticHuntStart}} TO {{vars.elasticHuntEnd}} } AND image_path:"*.scr" NOT(image_path:"C:\\Windows\\System32\\*" OR image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*")
